thread.title: A Spurs assistant coach had the perfect response to a Raptors player sneaking into their huddle
thread.title_full: A Spurs assistant coach had the perfect response to a Raptors player sneaking into their huddle

author: Mark Hinog
title: A Spurs assistant coach had the perfect response to a Raptors player sneaking into their huddle
text:
The Raptors fell to the Spurs on Tuesday night, but perhaps things could have changed if Terrence Ross’ sneaky plan worked near the end of the game. During a timeout, Ross casually walked up to the Spurs’ huddle to get some intel, but assistant coach Ime Udoka caught him in the act and covered Ross’ eyes.
It wasn’t as smooth as that time Auburn’s T.J. Dunans sneaked into Georgia’s huddle back in December , but that instance also worked because hardly anyone was paying attention. Auburn also lost to Georgia when it happened, so maybe huddle infiltration, in general, is never a good idea.
